products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home!
This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.This yellow roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Splash Rose Gold Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rose Gold Roller Blind in Orange/Pink. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Rose Gold is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Rose Gold roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Solar Yellow is a bright and sunny yellow vertical blind  perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous yellow vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant!  Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow Panel Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Solar Yellow Panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This yellow dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This yellow panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
